tooltip.illegal_mode_compatible: Questa opzione è compatibile con Illegal Mode, sarà utilizzata mentre questo è attivo.

bronze.label: Disegna linee verso le coffer di bronzo
bronze.tooltip: Disegna una linea dalla posizione del tuo personaggio a coffer di bronzo nei dintorni, mentre sei fuori dal combattimento.

silver.label: Disegna linee verso le coffer argentate
silver.tooltip: Disegna una linea dalla posizione del tuo personaggio a coffer argentate nei dintorni, mentre sei fuori dal combattimento.

show_button.label: Mostra tasto per la caccia al tesoro

detection.label: Raggio rilevazione coffer
detection.tooltip:
La distanza minima a cui devi essere da un nodo, prima che sia considerato non presente.
Questo dipende da quando il server invia la istanza di GameObject.
Un valore più basso sarà più affidabile, ma la caccia al tesoro occuperà un tempo maggiore.

max_level.label: Livello massimo area
max_level.tooltip: Il livello massimo consentito nella area in cui viene effettuata la caccia al tesoro

draw.label: Disegna una linea alle Carote
draw.tooltip: Disegna una linea dalla posizione del tuo personaggio alle Carote vicine.

demiatma.label: Mostra drop delle Demiatma
demiatma.tooltip: Mostra i drop delle Demiatma nella lista dei FATE/CE attivi.

notes.label: Mostra drop delle Note
notes.tooltip: Mostra i drop delle Note nella lista dei FATE/CE attivi.

soulshards.label: Mostra drop delle Soul Shards
soulshards.tooltip: Mostra i drop delle Soul Shards nella lista dei CE attivi.

should_mount.label: Mount after teleporting
should_mount.tooltip: The mount to use after teleporting.

path_to_destination.label: Path to event after teleporting
path_to_destination.tooltip: Use vnavmesh to head to the next event after teleporting via the OCH panel.

use_custom_paths.label: Use custom paths
use_custom_paths.tooltip: Use custom paths for certain events to stop vnavmesh from taking you to wild places.

return_after_fate.label: Return to base after FATE
return_after_fate.tooltip: Use Occult Return upon finishing a FATE to return to base camp.

return_after_critical.label: Return to base after Critical Encounter
return_after_critical.tooltip: Use Occult Return upon finishing a Critical Encounter to return to base camp.

approach_aetheryte.label: Approach aetheryte after returning
approach_aetheryte.tooltip:
Walk to the aetheryte after returning to base camp.
* Only works when returning via the plugin after a FATE or Critical Encounter.

main_on_load.label: Open main UI on load
main_on_load.tooltip: Opens the main UI when the plugin is loaded.

main_on_enter.label: Open main UI on enter
main_on_enter.tooltip: Opens the main UI when you enter an Occult Crescent zone.

main_on_exit.label: Close main UI on exit
main_on_exit.tooltip: Closes the main UI when you leave an Occult Crescent zone.

main_in_combat.label: Close main UI in combat
main_in_combat.tooltip: Close the main UI when you enter combat.

config_on_load.label: Open config UI on load
config_on_load.tooltip: Opens the config UI when the plugin is loaded.

config_on_enter.label: Open config UI on enter
config_on_enter.tooltip: Opens the config UI when you enter an Occult Crescent zone.

config_on_exit.label: Close config UI on exit
config_on_exit.tooltip: Closes the config UI when you leave an Occult Crescent zone.

config_in_combat.label: Close config UI in combat
config_in_combat.tooltip: Close the config UI when you enter combat.

show_debug.label: Show State
show_debug.tooltip: Show the current state in the main UI.

show.label: Show
show.tooltip: This is caught when the zone initializes, and will be unknown if the plugin is enabled or reloaded while in the zone.

enabled.tooltip: Illegal Mode is a bot, its actions are not dictated by your config outside of this section.

ai_provider.label: AI provider
ai_provider.tooltip: The mechanic AI provider you use

toggle_ai_provider.label: Toggle AI Provider
toggle_ai_provider.tooltip:
Toggle AI Provider on when starting fate/ce
Toggle AI Provider off when navigating to fate/ce

force_target.label: Force Target
force_target.tooltip: Ensure you always maintain a target in fates and critical encounters.

force_target_central_enemy.label: Prioritize central most enemy
force_target_central_enemy.tooltip: Try and target the enemy in the middle of the group.

engagement_range.label: Engagement Range
engagement_range.tooltip: The range to be at from a fate monster before dismounting and letting your rotation/ai plugin take over

do_critical_encounters.label: Do Critical Encounters
do_critical_encounters.tooltip: Should consider critical encounters when choosing an activity

delay_critical_encounters.label: Delay before heading to Critical Encounter
delay_critical_encounters.tooltip: Add a 10 - 15 second delay before heading to a critical Encounter

ce_scourge_of_the_mind.label: CE: Scourge of the Mind
ce_scourge_of_the_mind.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'Scourge of the Mind' critical encounter.

ce_the_black_regiment.label: CE: The Black Regiment
ce_the_black_regiment.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'The Black Regiment' critical encounter.

ce_the_unbridled.label: CE: The Unbridled
ce_the_unbridled.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'The Unbridled' critical encounter.

ce_crawling_death.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'Crawling Death' critical encounter.

ce_calamity_bound.label: CE: Calamity Bound
ce_calamity_bound.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'Calamity Bound' critical encounter.

ce_trial_by_claw.label: CE: Trial by Claw
ce_trial_by_claw.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'Trial by Claw' critical encounter.

ce_from_times_bygone.label: CE: From Times Bygone

ce_company_of_stone.label: CE: Company of Stone
ce_company_of_stone.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'Company of Stone' critical encounter.

ce_shark_attack.label: CE: Shark Attack

ce_on_the_hunt.label: CE: On the Hunt
ce_on_the_hunt.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'On the Hunt' critical encounter.

ce_with_extreme_prejudice.label: CE: With Extreme Prejudice
ce_with_extreme_prejudice.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'With Extreme Prejudice' critical encounter.

ce_noise_complaint.label: CE: Noise Complaint
ce_noise_complaint.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'Noise Complaint' critical encounter.

ce_cursed_concern.label: CE: Cursed Concern
ce_cursed_concern.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'Cursed Concern' critical encounter.

ce_eternal_watch.label: CE: Eternal Watch
ce_eternal_watch.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'Eternal Watch' critical encounter.

ce_flame_of_dusk.label: CE: Flame of Dusk
ce_flame_of_dusk.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'Flame of Dusk' critical encounter.

do_fates.label: Do Fates
do_fates.tooltip: Should consider fates when choosing an activity

fate_rough_waters.label: Fate: Rough Waters
fate_rough_waters.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'Rough Waters' fate.

fate_the_golden_guardian.label: Fate: The Golden Guardian
fate_the_golden_guardian.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'The Golden Guardian' fate.

fate_king_of_the_crescent.label: Fate: King of the Crescent
fate_king_of_the_crescent.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'King of the Crescent' fate.

fate_the_winged_terror.label: Fate: The Winged Terror
fate_the_winged_terror.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'The Winged Terror' fate.

fate_an_unending_duty.label: Fate: An Unending Duty
fate_an_unending_duty.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'An Unending Duty' fate.

fate_brain_drain.label: Fate: Brain Drain
fate_brain_drain.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'Brain Drain' fate.

fate_a_delicate_balance.label: Fate: A Delicate Balance
fate_a_delicate_balance.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'A Delicate Balance' fate.

fate_sworn_to_soil.label: Fate: Sworn to Soil
fate_sworn_to_soil.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'Sworn to Soil' fate.

fate_a_prying_eye.label: Fate: A Prying Eye
fate_a_prying_eye.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'A Prying Eye' fate.

fate_fatal_allure.label: Fate: Fatal Allure
fate_fatal_allure.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'Fatal Allure' fate.

fate_serving_darkness.label: Fate: Serving Darkness
fate_serving_darkness.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'Serving Darkness' fate.

fate_persistent_pots.label: Fate: Persistent Pots
fate_persistent_pots.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'Persistent Pots' fate.

fate_pleading_pots.label: Fate: Pleading Pots
fate_pleading_pots.tooltip: Toggle participation in the 'Pleading Pots' fate.

maintain.label: Stay mounted while out of combat.
maintain.tooltip: While in the idle state, this will enforce you to be mounted.

roulette.label: Use Mount Roulette
roulette.tooltip: Overrides configured mount and uses roulette instead

romeos_ballad.label: Apply Romeo's Ballad
romeos_ballad.tooltip: Apply the Phantom Bard Buff, Romeo's Ballad

enduring_fortitude.label: Apply Enduring Fortitude
enduring_fortitude.tooltip: Apply the Phantom Knight Buff, Enduring Fortitude

fleetfooted.label: Apply Fleetfooted
fleetfooted.tooltip: Apply the Phantom Monk Buff, Fleetfooted

threshold.label: Reapply Threshold
threshold.tooltip: The number of minutes remaining on the lowest buff to refresh them all during automatic execution.

button.tooltip: Switch to each enabled buffing phantom job and use their buffing skill, then switch back to your original phantom job.
